name: coming_soon_page
description: Trendy Instagram-worthy Coming Soon design with vibrant gradient, glowing typography, and modern decorative elements.

samples.contact_details: Reach out at info@dolze.ai for updates.

fieldPrompt.header_text: Write a short, attention-grabbing heading (2-3 words) that appears above the Coming Soon message. Examples: Stay Tuned, Big News, Coming Your Way, Get Ready. Use exciting, anticipatory language that builds excitement.
fieldPrompt.contact_email: Enter a professional contact email where customers can reach you for inquiries or updates (e.g., info@yourcompany.com, hello@yourbrand.com). Use an email that you actively monitor.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your website URL (e.g., yourbusiness.com, launch.yourbrand.com). Omit http:// or www for a cleaner, more professional appearance.
fieldPrompt.contact_details: Add any additional contact information or instructions for customers (e.g., Email us at info@yourbusiness.com for updates, Follow us on social media for news). Keep it concise and helpful.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Enter a hex color code that represents your brand identity (e.g., #FF5733 for orange, #4A90E2 for blue). Choose a color that aligns with your brand and creates the right emotional response for your upcoming launch.
